title: Spare a thought for Amber Rose, who is somehow still pregnant
text:
Amber is still very pregnant (Picture: Instagram)

Spare a thought for poor Amber Rose who, somehow, is still pregnant.

The 35-year-old hit the nine month mark on her second child back on 10 September, but her baby seems too darn comfortable to move.

And Amber jokingly reminded us all that she’s still preggers by sharing a cute video of her huge baby bump.

The model took a selfie video in her living room with The Jackson Five’s ABC blasting in the background.

Amber wore a leopard print midi-dress which accentuated her bump, with the star turning from side to side to show us that yep, there’s definitely still a baby in there.

The outspoken mama, who shares six-year-old son Sebastian with her ex-husband Wiz Khalifa, captioned the video: ‘Yes I’m still Pregnant.’

However, she seemed in good spirits, giggling her boyfriend Alexander ‘AE’ Edwards photobombed her selfie sesh.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The pair later headed out for some wig shopping in Studio City – although we’re surprised Amber isn’t spending all her time eating curry to speed things up.

This is Amber and AE’s first baby together (Picture: Osvaldo / BACKGRID)

This will be Amber and AE’s first child together, but while this is baby number two for Amber, it hasn’t been smooth sailing, as the star suffered hyperemesis gravidarum during her first trimester – the same extreme morning sickness that Kate Middleton and Amy Schumer experienced.

Amber was hospitalised and given IV treatments after constantly vomiting in the early weeks of her pregnancy.

Speaking as she hit the nine month mark back in September, Amber – who has been dating AE for a year – said: ‘‘So as of today, I am nine months pregnant y’all. It’s not a game, that’s a big boy in there. Sheesh. I’m pretty much on bed rest at this point.

‘I can’t walk that well. My ankles got a little swollen; my feet got a little swollen. But for the most part, I’m all belly. He’s coming soon, can’t wait.’

Well, it doesn’t look like Baby Edwards is in any rush.

description: Amber Rose reminds us she's still pregnant, showing off her baby bump on Instagram.
